nodes.text: The Retribution was a First Order Resurgent-class Star Destroyer that was present during the Cold War and the war between the First Order and the Resistance. In 34 ABY, it was under the command of Gideon Hask, and was used to destroy the Corvus while it was above Vardos. Later on during the conflict, the ship was infiltrated by Iden Versio, Zay Versio, and Shriv Suurgav in an attempt to find out more about Project Resurrection. It was later damaged and pulled out of hyperspace when Iden and Zay destroyed the hyperdrive.
